job_tasks.phrase: onderzoek uitvoeren naar de mogelijkheden van ChatGPT om de bedrijfsprocessen van Lab21 verder te automatiseren
job_tasks.justification: The phrase describes investigating how a specific technology (ChatGPT) can be used to improve business processes, indicating a focus on understanding business needs and aligning technology.

job_tasks.phrase: een strategische rol vervullen bij het bespreken van automatiseringsvraagstukken en de mogelijkheden die verdere automatisering biedt om de marktpositie van Lab21 te versterken
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions a strategic role in discussing automation to strengthen the company's market position, which falls under understanding business strategy and translating it to technology.
The act of proposing technological solutions implies an understanding of business needs and how technology can address them.

job_tasks.phrase: Je zult een onderzoek uitvoeren naar de mogelijkheden van ChatGPT
job_tasks.justification: While research-oriented, the context of applying ChatGPT to automate business processes suggests an eventual goal of implementing technological solutions, touching upon the application of technology.
The phrase directly mentions implementing and managing AI solutions, which are core aspects of software development and deployment in an AI context.

job_tasks.phrase: analyseren en optimaliseren van bestaande systemen en processen
job_tasks.justification: Analyzing and optimizing systems and processes, especially in the context of technology implementation, involves software development principles and practices.

soft_skills.phrase: Je werkt nauw samen met verschillende teams
je een grote invloed hebt op de invulling ervan
identificeert kansen om AI-technologieën toe te passen

classification.rationale: The role focuses heavily on business process automation and strategic alignment using AI tools like ChatGPT. While it mentions implementing and managing AI solutions, it lacks depth in core AI engineering tasks such as model development, fine-tuning, or RAG systems, leaning more towards a business-focused IT management role.
